term.title: power level

item.text: Logarithm of the ratio of a power to a reference power. Levels are expressed in different ways: LP = (1/2).ln(P/P0).Np, where Np is the symbol for the unit neper coherent with the SI, or LP = 10.log10(P/P0).dB, where dB is the symbol for the unit decibel .
